titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Uzbekistan
Uzbekistan

div.head: Legislation
div.p: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs has not yet worked out rules to establish access for its diplomatic records. Uzbekistan has a Freedom of Information Law with very broad exceptions. It is often superseded by a Law on the Protection of State Secrets.

div.head: Location
div.p: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Uzbekistan 9, Uzbekistan Street, Tashkent, 100029

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Inquire at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.
